data.title: ♡ prev. misselliedalden
data.text:
About Ellie

"When I was ten, I auditioned for the role of Lily Evans in Harry Potter. I remember walking into the audition room, and I’d never seen so many other ginger kids in all my life. And even though I never expected much, I kept advancing through the audition rounds. One day, I was asked to meet up in one of the offices, and Daniel Radcliffe walked out. I was really trying to keep my cool, but as he shook my hand he said, ‘I guess I’ll call you mum.’" [x]

Full Name: Ellie May Darcey-Alden [x] [x]

Birthday / Age: Saturday, 4 September 1999 (20 years old)

Star sign: Virgo

Birth place: Yarton, Oxford, England, United Kingdom

Current residence: Rancho Palos Verdes, Los Angeles, California, United States

Nationality: British

Ethnicity: English, French [x] [x]

Eye colour: Dark brown

Hair colour: Auburn

Height: 4'7" (2008); 4'9" (2010); 4'11" (2011); 5'3" (2012-14); 5'4" (2015) [x] [x]

Education:

Edward Feild Primary School (UK; Sep. 2005 - Jul. 2011)

Ridgecrest Intermediate School (US; Feb. 2013 - Jun. 2014)

Palos Verdes High School (US; Aug. 2014 - 7 Jun. 2018)

Parents: Sarah Dawn (née Darcey), Philip Rodney "Phil" Alden

Siblings: James Philip, Rebecca Charlotte "Becki", Joseph "Joe"

Partner(s): Khor Gracie (10 Apr. 2016) [x] [x]; Colton Russell (2017) [x]

For more information, check out the About Ellie page.

About Lily

"You've chosen your way. I've chosen mine."

Full Name: Lily J. Potter (née Evans) [x]

Birthday / Age: Saturday, 30 January 1960 (58 years old) [x]

Died: Saturday, 31 October 1981 (21 years old)

Cause: Murdered

Star sign: Aquarius

Birth place: Cokeworth, Midlands, England,

United Kingdom [x]

Residence: Godric's Hollow, West Country, England,

United Kingdom [x]

Blood status: Muggle-born

Nationality: British

Ethnicity: English

Eye colour: Bright green

Hair colour: Auburn/Dark red [x]

Education: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

(Highlands, Scotland, Great Britain; 1 Sep. 1971 - Jun. 1978)

House: Gryffindor

Parents: Mr and Mrs Evans

Sibling(s): Petunia Dursley (née Evans)

Spouse: James Potter Sr. (1978-1981)

Children: Harry James Potter (Thursday, 31 July 1980)

Updates

New gallery theme! Thanks again to Efruse!

Turned 20-years-old! In the Potter verse, she is the same age as Lily Evans when she gave birth to Harry on 31 Jul. 1980.

Blog name changed: misselliedalden → missellieevans.

Graduated Palos Verdes High School! Congrats!

Turned 18-years-old! In the Potter verse, she is the same age as Lily Evans when she was in her second semester of her 7th year at Hogwarts, 30 Jan. 1978.

New gallery layout! A huge thanks to Efruse from DeviantArt and Glamour Factory for their free theme. The header was made by yours truly, Emily.

Remnants 2020 (tv; pre-production)

Alice

After the fallout of World War Three, a group of young people try to survive in a war-torn world whilst being haunted by their pasts and under threat by the R.A.O.C, a Russian rebel group of soldiers.
